yuiNavSteps.configurationDescr: Configure the system and select an application.
yuiNavSteps.tileSettingsName: SAP Fiori Launchpad Configuration - Tile Settings for {{- projectName}}
yuiNavSteps.addNewModelName: Add OData Service and SAPUI5 Model
yuiNavSteps.addNewModelDescr: Select an OData service and SAPUI5 model.
yuiNavSteps.addLocalAnnotationFileDescr: Select an OData service and annotation XML file.
yuiNavSteps.replaceODataServiceDescr: Select an OData service and new OData URI.

prompts.systemTooltip: Select a system to load its application list.
prompts.usernameTooltip: Enter the user name for the back-end system.
prompts.passwordTooltip: Enter the password for the back-end system.
prompts.applicationListTooltip: Select the application for which you want to create an application variant.
prompts.fioriIdHint: This is an one-time, semantic identifier for the application variant. The Fiori ID is shown in the 'About' section of the application and is also available in the SAP Fiori Apps Reference Library.
prompts.achHint: The purpose of ACH components is to enable the support organization to indicate which BCP or ticket component may be responsible for a particular issue.
prompts.createExtProjectLabel: The selected application is not supported by the SAPUI5 Adaptation Project. For more information, see the SAPUI5 Adaptation Project documentation. Do you want to create an extension project instead?
prompts.extProjectSuggestion: Do you want to create an extension project instead?
prompts.createExtProjectWithSyncViewsLabel: Do you want to create an extension project instead? An extension project gives you the ability to create controller extensions for synchronous and asynchronous views.
prompts.createExtProjectContinueLabel: Please select whether you want to continue.
prompts.projectNameTooltip: Enter the project name for your application variant.
prompts.appTitleTooltip: Enter the application title for your application variant.
prompts.ui5VersionTooltip: Select the SAPUI5 version you want to use to preview your app variant.
prompts.targetEnvTooltip: Select the target environment for your Adaptation Project.
prompts.projectLocationTooltip: Select the path to the root of your project.
prompts.businessSolutionNameTooltip: The business solution name must be unique and consist of at least two segments and they must be separated by a period.
prompts.approuterTooltip: Select the HTML5 application runtime that you want to use.
prompts.baseAppTooltip: Select the base application you want to use.
prompts.businessServiceTooltip: Select the business service you want to use.
prompts.appInfoLabel: Synchronous views are detected for this application. Therefore, the controller extensions are not supported. Controller extension functionality on these views will be disabled.
prompts.notSupportedAdpOverAdpLabel: You have selected 'Adaptation Project' as the base. The selected system has an SAPUI5 version lower than 1.90. Therefore, it does not support 'Adaptation Project' as а base for a new adaptation project. You are able to create such а project, but after deployment, it will not work until the SAPUI5 version of the system has been updated.
prompts.isPartiallySupportedAdpOverAdpLabel: You have selected 'Adaptation Project' as the base. The selected system has an SAPUI5 version lower than 1.96 and for your adaptation project based on an adaptation project to work after deployment, you need to apply SAP Note 756 SP0 on your system.
prompts.v4AppNotOfficialLabel: You have selected an app based on SAP Fiori elements for OData V4. Note the following important information when you create adaptation changes: https://wiki.wdf.sap.corp/wiki/display/fioritech/Adaptation+Project+Support
prompts.projectNameLengthErrorExt: The name cannot contain more than 61 characters or end with the word 'component'.
prompts.projectNameValidationErrorExt: The name must only contain Latin alphanumeric characters. Every part must start with a letter and different parts can be separated by a period.
prompts.projectNameLengthErrorInt: The name cannot start with the word 'customer', contain more than 61 characters, or end with the word 'component'.
prompts.projectNameValidationErrorInt: The name must only contain Latin alphanumeric characters and it must have at least two parts. Every part must start with a letter and the different parts must be separated by a period.
prompts.projectNotInWorkspace: The project: '{{- path}}' is not in the workspace. Some adaptation project tools may not work. What do you want to do?
prompts.emptyAnnotationFile: An empty annotation file will be created in the webapp/changes/annotations folder of your project.

error.writingPhase: An error occurred in the writing phase of the adaptation project generation. To see the error, view the logs.
error.telemetry: An error occurred when sending telemetry data: {{- error}}. To see the error, view the logs.
error.updatingApp: An error occurred when creating a new adaptation project. To see the error, view the logs.
error.cloudSystemsForInternalUsers: You have selected a system that does not support On-Premise adaptation projects. Please select a supported system.
error.notDeployableNotFlexEnabledSystemError: The system that you have selected is not an ABAP On-Premise system. Adaptation projects are only supported on those systems. Please choose an ABAP On-Premise system which supports flexibility and DTA_FOLDER deployment.
error.notDeployableSystemError: The system that you have selected is not an ABAP On-Premise system which supports `DTA_FOLDER` deployment. Adaptation projects are only supported on those systems. Please choose an ABAP On-Premise system which supports `DTA_FOLDER` deployment.
error.notFlexEnabledError: The system that you have selected is not an ABAP On-Premise system which supports flexibility. Adaptation projects are only supported on those systems. Please choose an ABAP On-Premise system which supports flexibility. If you continue, you will only be able to create an extension project.
error.manifestCouldNotBeValidated: The `manifest.json` file of the selected application cannot be validated. Please select a different application.
error.appDoesNotSupportFlexibility: The selected application does not support flexibility because it has `flexEnabled=false`. SAPUI5 Adaptation Project only supports applications that support flexibility. Please select a different application.
error.appDoesNotSupportManifest: The selected application is not supported by SAPUI5 Adaptation Project because it does not have a `manifest.json` file. Please select a different application.
error.extensibilityExtensionNotFound: The Extensibility Project generator plugin was not found in your dev space and it is required for this action. To proceed, please install the <SAPUI5 Layout Editor & Extensibility> extension.
error.creatingExtensionProjectError: Creating the extension project failed. To see the error, view the logs.
error.appParameterMissing: Could not create an extension project because the application parameters are missing. Please select a different application.
error.destinationInfoMissing: Could not create an extension project because the destination info is missing. Please select a different system.
error.systemNotFound: System could not be found or is not supported: {{system}}. Please check the system exists.
error.applicationNotFound: The application could not be found or is not supported: {{appName}}. Please check the application exists.
error.backendCommunicationError: An error occurred when communicating with the back end. Please try again later.
error.pleaseProvideAllRequiredData: Please provide the required data and try again.
error.cfNotInstalled: Cloud Foundry is not installed in your space. Please install it to continue.
error.cfNotLoggedIn: You are not logged in to Cloud Foundry. Please login to continue.
error.baseAppHasToBeSelected: Base application has to be selected. Please select a base application.
error.businessServiceHasToBeSelected: Business service has to be selected. Please select a business service.
error.businessServiceDoesNotExist: The service chosen does not exist in cockpit or the user is not member of the needed space.
error.businessSolutionNameInvalid: Business solution name must consist of at least two segments and they should be separated by period.
error.cfLoginCannotBeDetected: CF Login cannot be detected as an extension in Visual Studio Code. For more information, see (link not yet available).
error.projectDoesNotExist: The project does not exist. Please select an MTA project.
error.projectDoesNotExistMta: Provide the path to the MTA project where you want to have your Adaptation Project created.
error.noAdaptableBusinessServiceFoundInMta: No adaptable business service found in the MTA.
